I never planned on moving to Texas prior to interview season, but the faculty and residents I met @bcmhouston and @TexasChildrens made me reconsider! The sense of community that I felt from the minute I stepped foot in TCH was outstanding.

@DrKenLiao @bcmhouston We would be happy to host you and your team anytime. Totally endoscopic is absolutely the way to go and maximizes the capabilities and benefits of the robotic system. We are using an 8 mm working port but working on a new method with no working port at all!
